name: BitPim Configuration File
summary: Learn about .BITPIM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BITPIM files are saved to the local computer in a data directory that contains files and folders representing phone book, calendar, wallpapers, ringtones, and other files on the cell phone. You can have multiple data directories for different phones.

description: File used by BitPim, a program used for viewing and changing data on Samsung, Sanyo, and other cell phones; saved in a plain text format and contains information about the phone and the data on the phone.
